about_the_game:
The fantasy interior set of the Winlu Tileset series offers an enormous selection of tiles and many possibilities for creating interiors. Living rooms, bedrooms, kitchens, hallways, cellars, dungeons, throne rooms up to massive cathedrals can be created with the tileset.

In addition, there is an enormous number of decoration options via character sprites to make each of your rooms unique and individual. There is also an entire tilesheet page for creating taverns and stores.

The styles of textures are numerous. From farmhouses, white gold gleaming palaces and dark iron rooms, it's all there. Fires, torches, fireplaces and candles in different colors and designs will make your world look alive.

Features:

* 32 character sheets
* 10 tile sheets

UPDATE MARCH 2024:

* Improved every tile (sharper edges)
* Added new cathedral windows with orange light
* Added a key tile

UPDATE SEP 2024:

* Complete pixelart improvement of all tiles and sprites
* Alchemy Table improvement


Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
